name: Citizen Defense
description:
Made by SodaCookie and Steven D.

Play as a town trying to defend their home city from an alien invasion! Play with various characters that each have unique strengths and weakness.

Assets Used:

  • https://notevibes.com/
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/mini-mike-s-mini-metros-core-collection-28926
  • https://jaks.itch.io/lowpolyforestpack
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/speedtree/free-speedtrees-package-29170
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/basic-bandit-89978
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/3d-game-kit-environment-pack-135167
  • http://freemusicarchive.org/
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/2d-simple-character-swordman-133259
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/easy-weapons-19365
